Drilbur (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0528: Swoobat
Pokémon
#0530: Excadrill →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Drilbur (TCG Pocket).

Drilbur has been featured on 12 different cards since it debuted in the Emerging Powers expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Drilbur cards are normally Fighting-type Basic Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Drilbur

Drilbur
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
Card Type Mark English
Expansion 		Rarity # Japanese
Expansion 		Rarity #

Excadrill Half Deck   13/30

Drilbur Emerging Powers 55/98 Terrakion Battle Strength Deck   007/014
Drilbur Dark Explorers 55/108 Dark Rush 040/069
Drilbur Primal Clash 89/160 Gaia Volcano 043/070
Drilbur Unified Minds 118/236 Miracle Twin 049/094
Drilbur Cosmic Eclipse 114/236 Dream League 030/049
Drilbur Vivid Voltage 091/185 Amazing Volt Tackle 059/100
Drilbur Fusion Strike 147/264 Fusion Arts 057/100
        Start Deck 100   229/414

Drilbur Temporal Forces 085/162 Cyber Judge 039/071
        Terastal Fest ex   083/187
Drilbur Surging Sparks 108/191 Paradise Dragona 028/064
